project.name: J-C774B-LENY-08-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF12-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted, these files handlers are never closed, and stored in a global arraylist, causing the entire program to fail to open any files from that point on.
project.run_command: env LENYA_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL" LENYA_WEBAPP_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp" JETTY_PORT="8888" JETTY_ADMIN_PORT="8889" java $SS_JAVA_OPTS -Djava.library.path=$SS_TC_DEPS/lib64/ -Xms32M -Xmx512M -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp "$SS_JAVA_CLASSPATH" -Djava.endorsed.dirs=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dorg.xml.sax.parser=org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser -Djetty.port=8888 -Dloader.jar.repositories=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/resources:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dwebapp=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp -Dhome=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL -Dorg.mortbay.util.URI.charset=ISO-8859-1 -Dloader.main.class=org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server Loader $SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/conf/main.xml

iopair.name: J-C774B-LENY-08-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF12-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: if (( $(pcregrep -Mc "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt") > 0 )); then echo "FAILED"; else echo "OK"; fi;
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(pcregrep -Mc """Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+""" "logfile.txt") times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_hbXkRmtV9hLogwIRlcfu AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_26o5XmqXNI) AND NOT timeout_uR2bwWEANP) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_26o5XmqXNI) OR timeout_uR2bwWEANP)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_26o5XmqXNI) AND NOT timeout_uR2bwWEANP) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_26o5XmqXNI) OR timeout_uR2bwWEANP))
